title.rendered: The Benefits of Using High-Quality Paint in Your Vaughan Home

content.rendered:
Repainting your home’s interior is a big commitment. One of the most important considerations is the quality of the paint you use. Using high-quality paint can provide a number of benefits, including lasting longer, easier application, its ability to hide flaws, resist fading, and being easier on the environment. Consider only experienced interior painting services to get the most for your money. 

Get the Most Out of Your Paint

High-quality paint is designed to last longer than lower-quality paint. This means that you won’t have to repaint your walls as often, you’ll spend less on home renovations during the life of your mortgage, and may not need as many coats of paint overall, which can save you money in the long run. This type of paint is made with higher-quality ingredients and is more durable.

There are a few things you can look for when determining whether or not paint is high-quality. These include:

  • Brand name: Choose a brand that industry professionals trust.
  • Price: It’s worth the money to pay for high-quality ingredients such as acrylic resins and titanium dioxide.
  • Finish: High-quality paint has a smooth, even finish due to additives that improve its appearance.
  • Coverage: High-quality paint covers your surface area better, without streaks, drips, or gaps. 
  • Warranty: Some high-quality brands offer money-back guarantees on their paint.

Hire a handyman in Vaughan that knows the ins and outs of what makes high-quality interior paint. 

Enjoy Easy Application and Hide Flaws Better

High-quality paint is also easier to apply than lower-quality paint. This is because it is thicker and more opaque, so you don’t need to apply as many coats. This will save you not only materials costs but also labour expenses. Moreover, high-quality paint hides flaws better than lower-quality paint because it is more opaque and has a smoother finish.

Create More Resistance to Fading and Stains

High-quality paint is more resistant to fading than lower-quality paint. This is because it is made with UV inhibitors that protect it from the sun’s harmful rays. Additionally, because it is made with a higher-quality resin that makes it more difficult for stains to penetrate, high-quality paint is more resistant to stains than lower-quality paint. This may be especially valuable when painting a kitchen where spills and splashes may damage poor-quality paint. 

Choose Paint That Is More Breathable and Eco-Friendly

High-quality paint is more breathable than lower-quality paint. This means that it allows moisture to evaporate from the walls, which can help to prevent mould and mildew growth. High-quality paint is also more eco-friendly than lower-quality paint, due to its low-VOC (volatile organic compound) ingredients, which are less harmful to the environment. Low-VOC paints also produce fewer fumes during application, which can be beneficial for people with asthma or other respiratory problems. Your handyman in Vaughan will also appreciate that opportunity to work with a less toxic compound. 

Let Handyman Connection Undertake Your Interior Painting Services 

If you’re ready to make significant improvements to your home, Handyman Connection can help. We have a team of experienced and qualified painters who can help you with any painting project, big or small. We offer a variety of services, including:

  • Interior painting
  • Exterior painting
  • Faux finishes
  • Wallpapering
  • Staining
  • Power washing

We use only high-quality paint and materials, and we guarantee our work. You owe it to yourself to invest in home renovations that will pay off in the long-run. Not only this, but we pride ourselves on delivering on every commitment, under-promising and over-delivering, and prizing the connection we have with you, our customer. Use this online form to schedule a consultation and get an estimate.
